registration_message: 💘 Welcome to Hearts Hunter! Whether you're looking for friendship, love, or just a conversation, you're in the right spot. Let's embark on this journey together. Tap 'Registration' to start your adventure in finding your heart's companion. Good Hunting!
request_location_or_city: 🌍 Send city name or geolocation for automatic detection After submitting a location, you will be able to see the distance to profiles that have also shared the location
enter_birthday_message:
📅 Please, enter your date of birth
DD.MM.YYYY or DD/MM/YYYY format
invalid_birthday_format: ⚠️ The date of birth is incorrect or an unrealistic age is specified
request_photo_message_text:
📸 Please, send your photo
📎 Click on the paperclip and attach your photo
wrong_photo_format:
⚠️ Wrong photo format
 Please, send correct photo
photo_rejected_message:
⚠️ The uploaded photo was rejected
 Please, upload another photo
photo_checking_message: ⌛️ Please wait. Your photo is being checked...
photo_verified_message: ✅ Congratulations! Your photo has been successfully verified
confirm_agreement_message: 📝 By clicking Continue, you confirm that you accept the User Agreement and the Privacy Policy
main_menu_message: Here you can see 👥new candidates, 💘mutual likes or change your ⚙️profile settings. Do you have any questions? Contact support {{supportBot}}
enter_aboutme_message: ✍️ Write a few lines about yourself
about_me_length_error: ⚠️ The entered text is too long. Please make sure your description contains no more than 1000 characters.
wrong_choise_message: 👆 Select one of the options or click ⬅️ back
wrong_agerange_message: ⚠️ The age range is incorrect. Please enter integers
error_agerange_input_message: An error occurred while processing the entered age range.
set_age_range_message: ⌨️ Send a range of ages (for example: 18-35)
set_prefer_location_message: 🗺️ Enter the city to search for couples
candidate_not_found_message: 😔🔍 Unfortunately, at the moment, we cannot provide suitable candidates according to your preferences. Please review the search parameters, such as age or region, and try again.
user_liked_premium_message:
💘 I like you!
Go to the 💕 Likes you section to view profile
no_likes_you_profiles_message: 💔 Sorry, but there are currently no profiles that have liked you. Keep swiping and you may find a match soon!
buy_premium_message: 🌟 See who likes you by upgrading to a Premium. See all the profiles that have liked you and connect with them immediately.

block_reasons.spam: Your account has been blocked due to spamming.
block_reasons.offensive_behavior: Your account has been blocked due to offensive behavior.
block_reasons.inappropriate_content: Your account has been blocked due to posting inappropriate content.
block_reasons.fraud: Your account has been blocked due to fraudulent activities.
block_reasons.impersonation: Your account has been blocked due to impersonation.
block_reasons.community_rules_violation: Your account has been blocked due to violation of community rules.
block_reasons.inactivity: Your account has been blocked due to inactivity.
block_reasons.suspected_hacking: Your account has been blocked due to suspected hacking activities.
block_reasons.face_not_detected: Your account has been blocked for repeatedly trying to upload a photo that does not comply with the service's policy.
block_reasons.deleted_himself: Your account has been marked for deletion and blocked.
block_reasons.multiple_complaints: Your account has been blocked due to numerous user complaints.

messages.banned_account: Your account has been banned for repeated violations of the service's usage rules.
messages.photo_rejected_multiple_times: Your account has been blocked for repeatedly trying to upload a photo that does not comply with the service's policy. Please contact support
messages.registration_rejected: ⚠️ You have been denied registration due to a violation of the service policy
messages.report_details: ✅ Please specify the reason for the complaint
messages.report_sent: ❗ Your report against user {{user}} has been sent
messages.select_subscription: 💎 Premium unlocks unlimited likes, viewing users who liked you, and ad-free experience
messages.follow_link_to_pay: Please follow the link to pay
